name: Divided (ArthTakeda)
description:
This game was made for the United Game Jam 2020, and the theme was "two".

Art work and design: @ArthTakeda, @OmegaSaru;

Programming: @ArthTakeda;

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

It's a puzzle game where you have to reunite objects that were broken into two pieces.

An evil mage saw a modern magician do the trick "cut in half" and got so angry he threw a spell to cut everything in two, now you, the magician is the one who needs to clean up the mess, using your magnetic wand to fix the objects.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

All of the assets beside the font were made by team during the game jam.

The font used is Retro Gaming from the user Daymarius and it's on https://www.dafont.com/pt/retro-gaming.font.
